class_g_07_home_01:
Put away your phones. It is time to begin our last
class together.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_02:
Home economics is the study of life’s necessities,
but looking back on our time together, I realize\r
that I focused almost entirely on food.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_03:
I hope it is not too late to shift to a discussion of
clothing—another necessity—in our last class.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_04:
As I’m sure you are aware, our academy has an
air of freedom about it.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_05:
We provide uniforms for each season to
accommodate the diverse climate of Paldea.\c
However, students are free to wear whichever
style they wish whenever they please.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_06:
You should all have received four sets of tops
and bottoms—one each for spring, summer, fall,\r
and winter—when the academy accepted you.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_07:
If, by chance, you were not aware of this, you
may wish to peruse your wardrobe.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_08:
As long as you wear our school uniform, the rest
of your ensemble need not be school-issued.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_09:
This includes your bag or your hat, if you choose
to wear one. You are even free to style your hair\r
however you wish.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_10:
Mr. Salvatore’s hairstyle, for example, would
almost certainly have been against school rules\r
when I was a boy.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_12:
There is one more thing that you all like to
decorate which, I must say, I find quite charming.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_answer_01:
No, not that. I speak of something smaller and far
more adorable...\c
More importantly, your desk is not different or
customized in the slightest![VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_answer_02:
No, not that. I speak of something smaller and far
more adorable...\c
More importantly, how you decorate the interior
of your dorm rooms is none of my business![VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_answer_03:
Perfectly correct! That’s the adorable little thing
I was speaking of! Ohhh, it interests me so![VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_13:
I must admit that I am fascinated by Rotom
Phones and how to customize them![VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_14:
What’s that...? How very intriguing!\c
So there’s a shop called Delibird Presents where
you can purchase cases for your Rotom Phones![VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_15: I thank you for that useful bit of information...[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_16:
I shall have to go myself first thing tomorrow to
get an adorable case of my own liking.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_17:
Forgive me... I seem to have gotten a little
carried away with this small talk.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_18:
Ahem. As this class known as home economics
nears its end, I offer these final words to you who\r
have been honing everyday life skills with me.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_19:
My field of study is not so decisive as the likes
of mathematics, for instance, where test scores\r
might play a part in deciding your future.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_20:
However, as you go on to cook for yourselves,
to take care of your Pokémon, to decide what to\r
wear in the morning when you awaken...[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_21:
I would be honored if what I have taught you
serves to smoothen out and enrich your lives,\r
even if only a little.\c
This sentiment was imparted to me by Mr. Hassel
and his particular outlook on such matters.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_22:
I thank you all from the bottom of my heart for
seeing this class through to the end.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_07_home_23:
Our time together has come to a close for today.
Prepare to do your best on our final exam.[VAR 0114(0029)]
